title: All licensed banks will be open for business on 11th & 12th: CBSL
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Central Bank of Sri Lanka (CBSL) has informed the public that all licensed banks will be opened for normal banking business on 11th and 12th of April 2022.
All licensed banks will be open for business on 11th & 12th: CBSL
